item.title: Exclusive: Blue Water Autonomy raises GV-led $50 million Series A to build unmanned ships
item.description: Blue Water Autonomy has raised a $50 million Series A, led by GV, Fortune has exclusively learned.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg gifted noise-canceling headphones to his Palo Alto neighbors because of the non-stop construction around his 11 homes
item.description: Zuckerberg's had many clashes with neighbors over real-estate projects.

item.title: Rebecca Kuang, with 6 bestsellers before age 30, returns to the fantasy genre with ‘Katabasis’
item.description: Kuang set her exploration of the mythology of hell in the 1980s. "I wasn’t writing about this political moment, but it does seem like we’re right back...

item.title: Cracker Barrel, under fire from Donald Trump Jr. and Steak n’ Shake, apologizes to fans but won’t drop new logo
item.description: “If the last few days have shown us anything, it's how deeply people care about Cracker Barrel ... You've also shown us that we could have done a bett...

item.title: Trump says he’s firing Fed governor Lisa Cook, she vows she ‘will not resign’
item.description: Trump's move is likely to touch off an extensive legal battle that will probably go to the Supreme Court and could disrupt financial markets.
